heading: Today
text: ***FROST ADVISORY TONIGHT FOR ESSEX CO., VT, AND COOS CO., NH***Patches of valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixing with clouds this afternoon.  Highs ranging through the 70s.  Winds light, becoming north to northwest near mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing and rather cool.  Areas of dense river valley fog.  Scattered frost in the cold spots.  Lows in the upper 30s to mid 40s, with mid 30s in the cold spots.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and cool.  Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s, a few mid 70s in the warmer valleys.  Light winds, becoming south less than 10 mph.
